changelog:
## [vv0.1.69](releases/tag/vv0.1.69) - 2024-12-20
<!-- bump-type:patch -->
### New Features

- improve main menu and sign in UIs. Add QR code so you can login to MS account on mobile [`9dad509`](/commit/9dad509bc2ad724c0359168d92caa6f9d3aff6a6)
- add modal query parameter for page load [`dd7c9c1`](/commit/dd7c9c172ea38796078c7d6e1d9c1f236ba8f2be)
- Armor Stand and armor model support ([#242](/issues/242))
Co-authored-by: Vitaly <vital2580@icloud.com> [`cb82963`](/commit/cb82963b86cd3e1540c49903cd3b8b19922cadf7)
- add zoom keybinding (Key - C) [`db7a9b9`](/commit/db7a9b9dd2c3f2dd825df34697a530caf12671aa)
- initial support for websocket (direct connection) servers. mcraft-fun-mineflayer plugin [`10ee4c0`](/commit/10ee4c00aefaff663b534239ea839378b1378d6a)
### Bug Fixes

- provide possible fix for rare issue when mobile control elements were going outside of the screen on ios [`36747e6`](/commit/36747e6bef4df2376e26338418a2898dda07a765)
- improve servers list UI for small width screens [`dd7c9c1`](/commit/dd7c9c172ea38796078c7d6e1d9c1f236ba8f2be)
- a lot of edge case world block updates fixes & improvements. Fix all known visual incosistencies after chunk edge block updates, make them faster [`064d704`](/commit/064d70480df479d74d3ccc375be7b1720698851b)
